txt.en: Perform more valiant deeds among the snows of the Misty Mountains.
Complete quests within the Misty Mountains.

You've spent enough time in the Misty Mountains to learn that it is bitterly cold, very dangerous, and as wild as any place you've ever seen. It's clear why few attempt this route, and no-one chooses to live here. Luckily the bulwark of Rivendell keeps the Goblins from wandering down into the lands to the West.
